Convention Safari Hotel - Scottsdale, ArizonaSEPTEMBER 16, 17, 18Enclosed shopping area I Holiday and Motel 6 nearby, within walking distance.Tentative ScheduleFri., Sept. 16 - Commercial Displays open noon.
